item.title: You Won't Believe What Happened at the Men's Big Ten Tournament 2022!
item.description: Overview of the 2022 Men’s Big Ten Tournament The 2022 Men’s Big Ten Tournament was held at the United Center in Chicago, Illinois from March 9-13, 2022 This was the first year the tournament was held in Chicago since the 2020 tournament was canceled due to the COVID-19 pandemic This year’s tournament featured all 14 Big Ten teams competing for the chance to be crowned Big Ten Champions Highlights of the Tournament The 2022 Men’s Big Ten Tournament was full of exciting moments and thrilling games.
